### Use
```python
$ pip install ppabam-check-os-ver
$ python
>>> from ppabam_check_os_ver.hi import hi
>>> hi()
```

### Development environment setting
```bash
# install PDM
# git clone ...
$ source .venv/bin/activate
$ pdm install
# $ vi ...

# TEST
$ pdm install
$ pdm test
$ pip install .

$ git add <FILE_NAME>
$ git commit -a
$ git push
$ pdm publish
Username: __token__
```
